newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunker final report and prices - Aug 6.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunker final report and prices - Aug 6.

text.p: (DELIVERED U.S.$/TONNE) 380 CST 180 CST MDO GAS OIL

COMMENTS - The Singapore bunker market rose amid tight supplies and fairly strong sales, traders said. An independent sold several 380-cst lots at $106.00 per tonne and a major sold 180-cst at $110.00 per tonne. Traders said buyers for prompt 380-cst supplies for loading within the next two to three days were bidding at premiums of up to $5 per tonne due to the tight supplies and berth congestion. -- Singapore Newsroom (65-870-3093)
